long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
### Download Product Images and Videos from AliExpress and Alibaba

Easily download images and videos from AliExpress and Alibaba product pages with our free tool. Download buttons appear directly on product pages or within a popup menu in the extension.

**Why Choose Our Tool?**
- Quick and user-friendly
- Direct download buttons on product pages
- Accessible via the browser extension icon

#### Getting Started

1. Install the extension by clicking the “Add to Chrome” button.
2. Open an AliExpress product page.
3. Click on the download buttons next to the product images.

You can also access the app window by clicking the extension icon in the top right corner of your browser to start downloading!

**Affiliate Disclosure:**
This extension participates in affiliate programs with AliExpress. When you use our extension to download images and videos, we may earn a commission for qualifying purchases made through the provided links. This does not affect your browsing experience or the functionality of the extension.

⚠️ **Disclaimer:**
 'AliExpress' is a registered trademark of AliExpress, Inc. Our application utilizes the AliExpress API, but we are not affiliated with, endorsed, or certified by AliExpress.

Explore the difference today!
